con:part.con:content: <!--WSDL generated by thinktecture WSCF; version 1.0.13.0--> <!--Wednesday, 10-04-2013 - 06:27 PM--> <definitions name="PreAuthService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">PreAuthService</wsdl:documentation> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0.xsd" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import1:SubmitPreAuthRequest"/> </message> <message name="submitPreAuthOut"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <part name="parameters" element="import1:SubmitPreAuthResponse"/> </message> <message name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service is not available</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:ServiceUnavailableFault"/> </message> <message name="InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:InternalFault"/> </message> <message name="ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> <part name="fault" element="import2:ExternalFault"/> </message> <portType name="PreAuthServiceInterface"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">Pre-Authorisation Service</wsdl:documentation> <operation name="GetMemberPreAuths"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <input message="tns:getMemberPreAuthsIn"/> <output message="tns:getMemberPreAuthsOut"/> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault" message="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service was not available</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault" message="tns:InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault" message="tns:ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> </fault> </operation> <operation name="SubmitPreAuth"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"/> <input message="tns:submitPreAuthIn"/> <output message="tns:submitPreAuthOut"/> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault" message="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">The service was not available</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault" message="tns:InternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was an internal fault</wsdl:documentation> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault" message="tns:ExternalFault"> <wsdl:documentation xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/">There was a fault with one or more of the parameters supplied</wsdl:documentation> </fault> </operation> </portType> <binding name="BasicHttpBinding_PreAuthServiceInterface" type="tns:PreAuthServiceInterface"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="GetMemberPreAuths"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://bupa.com/PreAuthService:getMemberPreAuthsIn" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ServiceUnavailableFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="InternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ExternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="SubmitPreAuth"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://bupa.com/PreAuthService:submitPreAuthIn" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ServiceUnavailableFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="InternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="InternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> <fault name="ExternalFault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="ExternalFault" namespace=""/> </fault> </operation> </binding> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.GetMemberPreAuths_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonPreAuth="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for member pre-auth retrieval</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="MemberPreAuthsRequest" type="tns:MemberPreAuthsRequest" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="MemberPreAuthsResponse" type="tns:MemberPreAuthsResponse" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="MemberPreAuthsRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for pre-authorisations associated with a given member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member for whom the pre-authorisation information is requested</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MemberPreAuthsResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response for pre-authorisations associated with a given member.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PreAuths" type="commonPreAuth:ArrayOfPreAuths" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A collection of pre-authorisations associated with the member's policy and product.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonDiagnosis="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:commonProcedure="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:commonProvider="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Provides the PreAuth definition</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="PreAuth" type="tns:PreAuth" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfPreAuths" type="tns:ArrayOfPreAuths" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="PreAuth"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A pre-authorisation record</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaPreAuthId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the pre-authorisation. When submitting a pre-authorisation, if a Bupa Identifier is not passed (is null or empty), then it is assumed that this is a new pre-authorisation. If a Bupa Identifier is supplied then it is assumed that a new version of the pre-authorisation is being created</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version number of the pre-authorisation. When a pre-authorisation is first created it has a version number of 0. Whenever an adjustment is made to that pre-authorisation, a copy of the current version is taken, the version number on the copy is incremented and the relevant changes are applied to the data on the pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BupaMemberId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the member for whom the pre-authorisation is created.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerPreAuthReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The originating partner's reference for this pre-authorisation. To be supplied when a pre-authorisation is being created. This value will be blank when returning pre-authorisation information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Type" type="tns:PreAuthType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The type of the pre-authorisation (e.g. "OutPatient", "PostHospitalisationServices")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ContactName" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the person who contacted Bupa or Partner to create the pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TreatmentSummary" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The summary of the treatment requested.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ProcedureDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date of the requested procedure.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ConsultationtDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date of the consultation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the country the treatment will take place in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Provider" type="commonProvider:Provider" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The provider associated with the prea-uth.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DoctorDetails" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the doctor who will carry out the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LengthOfStayRequested" type="xs:short" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The length of stay requested represented as the number of nights.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="LengthOfStayApproved" type="xs:short" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The length of stay approved represented as the number of nights.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OnsetDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The date the condition started.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdmissionDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The planned admission date for the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DischargeDate" type="xs:dateTime" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The planned discharge date for the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="EstimatedCostOfTreatment" type="xs:decimal" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The estimated financial cost of the treatment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CurrencyCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the currency the treatment payment will be made in.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GeneralNotes" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Additional information on the pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryDiagnosis" type="commonDiagnosis:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary diagnosis of the member's condition.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PrimaryProcedure" type="commonProcedure:Procedure" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The primary planned procedure.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SecondaryProcedure" type="commonProcedure:Procedure" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The secondary diagnosis of the member's condition.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OutpatientType" type="tns:PreAuthOutpatientType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The type of outpatient treatment (e.g. "Chemotherapy", "CtScans")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Status" type="tns:PreAuthStatus" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The status of the pre-authorisation (e.g. "Approved", "Claimed")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RejectionReason" type="tns:PreAuthRejectionReason" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The reason for rejection of the pre-authorisation (e.g. "ChronicCondition", "BenefitLimitreached")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ContactMethod" type="tns:PreAuthContactMethod" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The person/organisation that requested the pre-authorisation (e.g. "Provider", "Member")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ContactType" type="tns:PreAuthContactType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The method by which the pre-authorisation was requested (e.g. "Email", "Telephone")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PayeeType" type="tns:PreAuthPayeeType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Who will be paid for the claim linked to this pre-authorisation (e.g. "Member", "Provider")</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfPreAuths"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PreAuth" type="tns:PreAuth" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthRejectionReason"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of pre-authorisation rejection reason options</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestFurtherInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because further information is required</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TreatmentNotApproved"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because treatment has not been approved</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GroupSecOrBrokerContactsProviderNotKnown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the group secretary, broker or provider is not known</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NotActiveTreatment"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because there is no active treatment in place</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TreatmentHasAlreadyTakenPlace"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because treatment has already occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NoBenefitUnderPolicy"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the policy does not support the requested treatment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ChronicCondition"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the condition is chronic</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CongenitalCondition"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the condition is congenital</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DoctorAssessingCase"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because a doctor is the assessing the case</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TreatmentDestinationRejected"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the treatment destination has been rejected</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MedicalDeclarationNotAuthorised"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the medical declaration has not been authorised</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MoneyOutstanding"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because money is outstanding</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OicRejection"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Not to be used</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PreExistingCondition"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the condition is pre-existing</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ConditionExcludedByUnderwriting"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the condition is excluded in the policy underwriting</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NoBenefitChronicOrCongenialOrEtc"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because there is no benefit associated with chronic or congenital or other causality.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="BenefitLimitreached"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the benefit limit has been reached</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CountryofTreatmentNotCovered"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because the treatment county is not covered</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="LapsedOrPendedOrNoSale"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because of a lapse or pended account</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MoratoriumApplies"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is being rejected because a moratorium applies</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthContactType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a list of options which should identify pre-authorisation contact types</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GroupSecretary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is a group secretary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Intermediary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is an intermediary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Member"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is another unspecified type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Isos"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is an international SOS</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ServicePartnerOrTpa"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The contact type is service partner or third party ad</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthPayeeType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">List the pre-authorisation payee type options</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ApplicantMember"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The payee type is the applicant member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Company"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The payee type is a company</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Member"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The payee type is a member</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The payee type is a provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthOutpatientType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">List the pre-authorisation outpatient types</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Chemotherapy"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to chemotherapy</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CtScans"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to CT scans</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DentalExceptions"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to exceptional dental work</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Maternity"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to maternity</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Mri"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to MRI</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OicOutpatient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to OIC. Not to be used</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to another type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OutpatientOncologyTreatment"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to oncology treatment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PetScans"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to PET scans</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OutpatientSurgicalProcedures"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Outpatient is related to outpatient surgical procedures</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthStatus"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Lists the different status types associated with pre-authorisations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Approved"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has been approved</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Claimed"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has been claimed</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Expired"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has expired</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Referred"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has been referred</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Rejected"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has been rejected</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Cancelled"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation has been cancelled</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthContactMethod"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a list of contact mediums associated with a pre-authorisation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Email"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contact by Email</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Fax"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contact by Fax</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Post"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contact by Post</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Telephone"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Contact by Telephone</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PreAuthType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a list of pre-authorisation types</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ChemotherapyInpatient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with a chemotherapy inpatient</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="EmergencyOutOfArea"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with an emergency out of area request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="EnquiryOnly"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with an enquiry</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="EvacuationOrRepatriation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with an evacuation or repatriation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="InPatientOrDayCase"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with an inpatient or day case</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MaternityInpatient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with a maternity inpatient</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OutPatient"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with an outpatient</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PostHospitalisationServices"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with post hospitalisation services</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PreHospitalisationServices"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The pre-authorisation is assocated with pre hospitalisation services</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Diagnosis_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common diagnosis type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ArrayOfDiagnosis" type="tns:ArrayOfDiagnosis" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Diagnosis"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Standard" type="tns:DiagnosisStandard" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The standard of the diagnosis</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ArrayOfDiagnosis"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>A collection of diagnosis.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Diagnosis" type="tns:Diagnosis" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A diagnosis type.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="DiagnosisStandard"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of supported diagnosis standards .</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD9"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v9 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ICD10"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">International Classification of Diseases v10 diagnosis standard</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Procedure_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common procedure type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Procedure" type="tns:Procedure" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Procedure"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The code of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The description of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Standard" type="tns:ProcedureStandard" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The standard of the procedure</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ProcedureStandard"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A list of procedure codes</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Unknown"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Unknown value. Not to be used.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CPT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Indicates Current Procedural Terminology standard.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Bupa"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's own standard for procedure codes.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" id="com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Provider_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the common Provider type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="Provider" type="tns:Provider" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="Provider"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>When Bupa receive a provider record associated with a claim for the first time from a partner, the provider information supplied is stored and allocated a unique Bupa provider number. Subsequent claims may use the BupaProviderId or continue to use the partner's PartnerReference.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaProviderId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Bupa's unique identifier for the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerReference" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The partner's reference for this provider. This is not returned from Bupa.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Name" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The name of the provider</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CountryCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation source="http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes" xml:lang="en">The ISO code for the correspondence address of the provider.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.preauths.SubmitPreAuth_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.SubmitPreAuth_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.SubmitPreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.SubmitPreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.preauths.SubmitPreAuth_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:commonPreAuth="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0"> <xs:import namespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0" schemaLocation="com.bupa.bi.commonpreauths.PreAuth_v1_0.xsd"/> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Request/response pair for creating pre-auths</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="SubmitPreAuthRequest" nillable="true" type="tns:SubmitPreAuthRequest"/> <xs:element name="SubmitPreAuthResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:SubmitPreAuthResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="SubmitPreAuthRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the request for a pre-authorisation to submitted.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestUsername" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The username of the user requesting information.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PreAuth" type="commonPreAuth:PreAuth"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Details of the pre-authorisation to create.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SubmitPreAuthResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Encapsulates the response of a submitted pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BupaPreAuthId" type="xs:string" nillable="true"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The allocated Bupa identifier of the newly created pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:int" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The version identifier for the newly created pre-authorisation.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema id="com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" targetNamespace="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:mstns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:tns="urn://com.bupa.bi.common.Faults_v1_0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the faults which may emanate from Bupa Systems</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="InternalFault" type="tns:InternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ExternalFault" type="tns:ExternalFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:element name="ServiceUnavailableFault" type="tns:ServiceUnavailableFault" nillable="true"/> <xs:complexType name="InternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the InternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured within the Bupa system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details regarding the internal fault</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RetryIndicator" type="xs:boolean" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds an indicator which described whether the fault may be rectified by retrying</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ExternalFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ExternalFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to incorrect supply of data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Description" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a description which contains details of why the external fault occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Code" type="tns:ExternalFaultCode" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds a value which indicates the category of external fault generated</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ServiceUnavailableFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Definition of the ServiceUnavailableFault type. This fault type is used to indicate faults which have occured due to system being temporarily out of service</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Information" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Holds information which is associated with service downtime and restoration expectations</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ExternalFaultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The list of external fault codes which indicate general reasons as to why a fault has occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="InsufficientDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Insufficient data has been supplied to execute the request</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="IncompatibleDataSupplied"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">Incompatible data was supplied in one or more fields or data supplied was not compatible with existing data</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="GeneralValidationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general validation error occured</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="RequestedDataNotFound"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested data was not found</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AuthorizationFailure"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The connecting client could not be authorized</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="OperationNotImplemented"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">The requested operation has not been implemented and is not supported</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="Other"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation xml:lang="en">A general error occured which could not be classified</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
